heading: WHAT YOU NEED: Resistance band and sturdy, armless chair. TIP: As you progress, use a heavier strength band. This variation of the Arm Curl uses a resistance band instead of weights.

steps.1: Sit in a sturdy, armless chair with your feet flat on the floor, shoulder-width apart.
steps.2: Place the center of the resistance band under both feet. Hold each end of the band with palms facing inward. Keep elbows at your sides. Breathe in slowly.
steps.3: Keep wrists straight and slowly breathe out as you bend your elbows and bring your hands toward your shoulders.
steps.5: Breathe in as you slowly lower your arms.
